verbs.description: [ARG1: sound mixer] [V: falls] [ARG4: to his death] [ARGM-LOC: on set of tom hanks’] mr rogers biopic he was taken to upmc mercy hospital near mt lebanon pa in serious condition but his status worsened after arriving tom hanks stars as fred rogers in the biopic with matthew rhys co - starring as a journalist who became friends with rogers diary of a teenage girl director marielle heller is helming the movie from a script by micah fitzerman - blue and noah harpster mr rogers noah harpster fred rogers jorma taccone lebanon matthew rhys tom hanks director sony chris cooper pittsburgh associated press upmc mercy hospital marielle heller james emswiller harpster ohio pennsylvania micah fitzerman - blue mt los angeles wpxi tom junod
